price: 37. ¿Acaso no era el hombre una insignificante cantidad de esperma eyaculada
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: alam yaku nuṭ'fatan min maniyyin yum'nā
